name: Flashlight Reggie
description:
Spacebar- Jump

Mouse- Control flashlight

Left Click- Toggle Flashlight

------------

Theme: What's hiding in the dark?

Engine: Gamemaker 2

Flashlight Reggie is an infinite-runner made in 48 Hours for Spooky 2D Jam 2022.

Use your flashlight to help you see upcoming obstacles, power ups, and defeat ghosts in this little game starring a pumpkin boy. (His name is Reggie.)

------------

Credits:

Jordan/Sprityo - Design

Zepht - Art

Field_Medic - Programming

Zufaix - Music

Assets Used:  Aura 1.0 Lighting Engine
